<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81366</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>3280</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Stephen's Brief</string>
            <string language="es">El escrito de Stephen</string>
            <string language="ga">Achomair Stephen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schriftsatz Stephens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le dossier de Stephen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sumário De Stephen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riassunto Dello Stephen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Stephen σύνοψη</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Stephen's letter is a reply to a German penpal who had asked him about the Leaving Certificate and his plans for afterwards.</string>
            <string language="es">La carta de Stephen es una respuesta a un amigo por carta alemán que le ha preguntado sobre el Certificado Leaving y sus planes para después.</string>
            <string language="ga">Is freagra é litir Stephen ar chara pinn Gearmánach a d’iarr ceisteanna air faoin Ardteist agus rudaí a dhéanfaidh sé i ndiaidh na hArdteiste.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">German</string>
            <string language="es">Alemán. Escritura/Schreiben. Ejemplo con demostraciones</string>
            <string language="ga">Gearmáinis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Writing/Schreiben</string>
            <string language="ga">Scríobh</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worked Example</string>
            <string language="ga">Sampla Oibrithe</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichen Stephens ist eine Antwort auf ein 
deutsches penpal, wer ihn nach der verlassenden Bescheinigung und 
seine Pläne um danach gebeten hatte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La lettre de Stephen est une réponse à un 
penpal allemand qui avait demandé lui sur le certificat de fin 
d'études et ses plans après.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A letra de Stephen é uma resposta a um penpal 
alemão quem tinha pedido o sobre o certificado sair e suas plantas 
para mais tarde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La lettera dello Stephen è una risposta ad un 
penpal tedesco chi aveva interrogato lui riguardo al certificato 
andante ed i suoi programmi in seguito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Stephen η επιστολή είναι μια απάντηση γερμανικός 
penpal που είχε ρωτήσει τον για το πιστοποιητικό αναχώρησης και
τα σχέδιά του για κατόπιν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutsch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Writing/Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bearbeitetes Beispiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Allemand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Writing/Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exemple Travaillé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alemão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Writing/Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exemplo Trabalhado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tedesco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Writing/Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esempio Funzionato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γερμανικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψιμο/Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασμένο παράδειγμα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
